properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Hubirini kwa sauti ya kuimba
Tangazeni tangazeni haya,
yatamkeni mpaka
mwisho wa dunia,
semeni Bwana amelikomboa
taifa lake.
Aleluya, aleluya, aleluya, Aleluya.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mpigieni Mungu kelele
za shangwe nchi yote,
imbeni tukufu wa jina lake.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tukuzeni sifa zake,
mwambieni Mungu,
matendo yako
yanatisha kama nini.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Atukuzwe Baba na Mwana
na Roho Mtakatifu,
kama mwanzo na
sasa na siku zote,
na milele amina.
